items.sentence: I remember when we used to never eat vegetables that we didn\'t grow ourselves.
I don\'t know any of Tom\'s brothers. I don\'t know any of his sisters, either.
When you\'re speaking with your classmates, what language do you usually speak?
Tom is so old that even the oldest in the village first knew him as an old man.
Tom knew that he should study French every day if he really wanted to learn it.
